comment.text: This translation key "CustomRoomTitle" is used to display the label for custom rooms in various UI elements. It is likely used as a button title or a room type filter option, and its content should reflect the desired human-readable name for these custom rooms.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Հարմարեցված սենյակ" is a literal translation of "Custom room", it doesn't fully capture the nuance. "Custom" often implies personalization or creation, not just adaptation. A more accurate translation might convey that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Ձևավորված սենյակ" (Designed room), "Պատվերով սենյակ" (Ordered room), or "Անհատական սենյակ" (Personalized room) depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Sala particularizată" is technically correct, it's a bit formal and clunky for a user-facing setting like a 'Custom room' title. It doesn't convey the same feeling of personalization and ease.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Cameră personalizată" or "Camera ta" which are more natural and friendly.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අභිරුචි කාමරය' while technically meaning 'custom room', sounds slightly awkward and not the most natural phrasing in Sinhala. 'අභිරුචි' implies a very high degree of customization, whereas 'custom' can be more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'අ sendiri පරිභෝජනයට හැකි කාමරය' (a room for personal use) or 'ත sendiri නිර්මාණය කළ කාමරය' (a room that's designed/created) depending on the specific nuance intended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation 'Прилагођена соба' is a literal translation of 'Custom room' but doesn't fully convey the intended meaning in context. 'Custom room' often implies a room that can be personalized or modified. A more appropriate translation would consider this nuance.
